data.title: Patrick J. McGovern Foundation
data.meta_description: 21st Century Philanthropy Advancing Data and AI for Good
data.text:
Vilas Dhar

President and Trustee

Vilas is an entrepreneur, technologist and human rights advocate with a lifelong commitment to creating more robust social institutions that foster shared opportunity.

Mary Rodriguez

Vice President of People

Mary focuses on making the Foundation an exceptional place to work and fosters a culture that inspires the world’s most passionate talent.

Aidan Berger

Strategy Analyst, Strategic Capital

Aidan supports the Strategic Grants team’s efforts to allocate resources to socially impactful AI and data science solutions in collaboration with Foundation leadership, programmatic teams, and external partners.

Yolanda Botti-Lodovico

Storytelling and Advocacy Lead

Yolanda works to develop and execute strategies that identify and amplify diverse stories of impact across our partner community, demonstrating the potential of AI to benefit both people and the planet.

Elena Brennan

Strategy and Innovation Associate

Elena works with the Strategy and Innovation Team to support the foundation’s justice-inspired mission. She assists in grant partnerships to leverage digital, AI, and data-driven solutions to address global issues.

Nick Cain

Vice President, Strategy and Innovation

Nick leads the Foundation’s strategy team, ​​which works to advance digital, AI, and data-driven solutions to global challenges through a combination of hypothesis-driven grantmaking, partnerships, and ecosystem engagement.

Nicholas Davis

Front End Developer

Nick is a seasoned technologist with a specialization in UI/UX design and Front End Development. Nick meticulously crafts technology products that not only meet industry standards but also leave a positive impact on society

Gwen Hotaling

Communications Associate

Gwen spreads awareness and amplifies the impactful work of the Foundation and our grant partners across the globe through digital media.

Simone Liano

Strategy Analyst, Strategic Capital

Simone supports the Strategic Capital team in identifying opportunities to fund data science and AI initiatives supporting environmental and social impact.

Crystal Luo

Operations Associate

Crystal, a dedicated member of the Operations team, is committed to facilitating and optimizing the foundation’s operational functions, ensuring efficiency and seamless execution across all activities.

Hazem Mahmoud

Director, Products and Services

Hazem provides direct technical assistance around Data Analytics, Engineering and Operations to Foundation grantees and partner organizations.

Patrick McGovern

Trustee

Patrick, a longstanding technology executive, serves as a member of the Board of Trustees and the foundation’s Investment Committee.

Bob Merriman

Director of Operations

With over 20 years of experience in strategy, operations, and technology, Bob is focused on driving optimization to accelerate PJMF’s mission to create a thriving, sustainable, and equitable future for all.

Topaz Mukulu

Strategy Analyst, Strategic Capital

Topaz supports the Foundation’s efforts to identify and resource institutions championing human-centered AI and data-driven transformation rooted in equity and dignity.

Abeer Nawaz

People and Culture Manager

Abeer leads People and Culture at PJMF, championing a sustainable future with a focus on recruitment, L&D, DEI, employee relations, retention, and internal communications.

Christopher Page

People and Culture Associate

Chris is committed to making the foundation an incredible place to work, addressing each part of the employee life cycle in the process.

Valmik Patel

Data Scientist

Valmik focuses on supporting the Products and Services team by using artificial intelligence and machine learning to create technology products that make a positive impact.

Michelle Pomerantz

Board Liaison, Office of the President

Michelle supports the Board of Trustees to help the Foundation achieve its strategic goals. Michelle advises on Board specific philanthropic initiatives and facilitates external Board engagement.
